amendment.description: An amendment numbered 74 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funds from being used to develop, finalize, or implement the proposed rule titled "Revising Scope of the Mining Sector of Projects That Are Eligible for Coverage Under Title 41 of the Fixing America's Surface Transportation Act" (88 Federal Register 65350).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore (UT) amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore (UT) amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore (UT) amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.
